mapper.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_id, alarm_receiver_id, alarm_sender_id, alarm_type, alarm_content, alarm_url, alarm_datetime, alarm_check_datetime) values (0,#{alarmReceiverId}, #{alarmSenderId}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmContent}, #{alarmUrl}, now(), null)
mapper.update: update alarm set alarm_type = #{alarmType} , alarm_content = #{alarmContent}, alarm_url = #{alarmUrl}, alarm_datetime = #{alarmDateTime}, alarm_check_datetime = null where alarm_id = #{alarmId}
mapper.select: select alarm_id alarmId, alarm_receiver_id alarmReceiverId, alarm_sender_id alarmSenderId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_content alarmContent, alarm_url alarmUrl, alarm_datetime alarmDateTime, alarm_check_datetime alarmCheckDateTime from alarm and alarm_id = #{alarmId}

select alarm_id alarmId, alarm_receiver_id alarmReceiverId, alarm_sender_id alarmSenderId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_content alarmContent, alarm_url alarmUrl, alarm_datetime alarmDateTime, alarm_check_datetime alarmCheckDateTime from alarm where user_id = #{userId} and alarm_datetime between date_format(#{alarmDateTime}, '%Y-%m-01') and date_format(last_day(#{alarmDateTime}), '%Y-%m-%d')

select alarm_id alarmId, alarm_receiver_id alarmReceiverId, alarm_sender_id alarmSenderId, alarm_type alarmType, alarm_content alarmContent, alarm_url alarmUrl, alarm_datetime alarmDateTime, alarm_check_datetime alarmCheckDateTime from alarm where user_id = #{userId} and alarm_content like concat('%',#{alarmContent},'%')
